Key Match Events: Jamiro Monteiro scored the first goal for Cape Verde on 17 minutes
Majeed Ashimeru's long-range shot was ruled out for offside
Alexander Djiku headed the equaliser for Ghana on 57 minutes
Garry Rodrigues scored the winning goal for Cape Verde in stoppage time
Pre-Game Insights: Ghana entered the 2023 Afcon with hope of winning their fifth Afcon title
Coach Chris Hughton will need to pull out all the stops for Ghana's next game against Egypt
Post-Match Reflections: Ghana will need to revisit the drawing board after the shock defeat by Cape Verde
Coach Chris Hughton will need to make changes for Ghana's next game
Miscellaneous Highlights: Cape Verde sit top of Group B with three points after Egypt and Mozambique drew 2-2
Ghana will need to climb a mountain to progress from Group B
Others: Mohammed Kudus' absence due to a hamstring injury was a big miss for Ghana
Ghana lacked the penetrating power that Mohammed Kudus brings to their attack
